question: How many hospitals are there in Oxford?

question: How many underground lines does London have?
How many counties does England have?
answer: select (count(distinct ?x) as ?totalCounty) where {               ?x  ?p <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_county_108546183>.              ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England>. }

question: Which restaurants are close to London Bridge?
answer: SELECT distinct ?poi WHERE   {  ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom;                    osm:has_name "London Bridge"^^xsd:string;                    a osm:Attraction.         ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT        ?instanceWKT.         ?poi rdf:type osm:Restaurant ;              geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom .         ?poiGeom  geo:asWKT        ?poiWKT .              FILTER(geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) < 1000) }

question: Is there any hospital in a range of 1 km from Jubilee Gardens in London?
answer: ASK{  ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom;                    osm:has_name "Jubilee Gardens"^^xsd:string;                   a osm:Park.        ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT        ?instanceWKT.        ?poi rdf:type osm:Hospital ;             geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom .        ?poiGeom  geo:asWKT        ?poiWKT .             FILTER(geof:distance(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT, uom:metre) < 1000) }

question: Which counties border county Lincolnshire?

FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?lcWKT, ?cWKT)) }

question: Which counties of Scotland border England?
answer: select distinct ?county  where {                                         ?county rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OS_County>;                                                 geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom.                                         ?cGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT.                                         <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Scotland>         geo:hasGeometry ?geom.                                         ?geom geo:asWKT ?iWKT.                                         <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England>                geo:hasGeometry ?geom1.                                          ?geom1 geo:asWKT ?iWKT1.                                         FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?cWKT,?iWKT) && geof:sfTouches(?cWKT,?iWKT1) )  }

question: Which restaurants are at most 1km away from Big Ben?
answer: SELECT ?restaurant WHERE {        ?bigBen osm:has_name "Big Ben"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string>;          geo:hasGeometry ?bigBenGeom.  ?bigBenGeom  geo:asWKT ?bigBenGeomWKT. ?restaurant rdf:type osm:Restaurant;      osm:has_name ?restaurantName;        geo:hasGeometry ?restaurantGeom.  ?restaurantGeom geo:asWKT ?restaurantGeomWKT.  FILTER (geof:distance(?restaurantGeomWKT, ?bigBenGeomWKT, uom:metre) < 1000) }

question: Is county Oxfordshire east of the county Essex?
answer: ASK { ?oxfordshire <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?l ;         geo:hasGeometry ?geo1 .         filter(str(?l)="Oxfordshire").  ?geo1 geo:asWKT ?wkt1 .         ?essex <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?l2 ;         geo:hasGeometry ?geo2 .         ?geo2 geo:asWKT ?wkt2 .         filter(str(?l2)="Essex").         FILTER(strdf:left(?wkt1,?wkt2)) }

question: Which pubs in Dublin are near Guinness Brewery?
answer: Select distinct ?pub WHERE {  ?pub a osm:Pub ; geo:hasGeometry ?pubGeo . ?pubGeo geo:asWKT ?pubWKT . ?dublin osm:has_name ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?dublinGeo . ?dublinGeo geo:asWKT ?dublinWKT . ?guiness osm:has_name ?l; geo:hasGeometry ?guinessGeo . ?guinessGeo geo:asWKT ?guinessWKT . filter( str(?l2)="Dublin"). filter( str(?l)="Guinness Brewery"). filter(geof:distance(?guinessWKT, ?pubWKT, uom:metre)<1000). filter(geof:sfContains(?dublinWKT, ?pubWKT)). }

question: Which hospitals in Liverpool are near Abercromby Square?
answer: Select distinct ?hospital WHERE { ?hospital a osm:Hospital ; geo:hasGeometry ?hospitalGeo .  ?hospitalGeo geo:asWKT ?hospitalWKT . ?Liverpool <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label>  ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LiverpoolGeo . ?LiverpoolGeo geo:asWKT ?LiverpoolWKT . ?Abercromby osm:has_name ?l; geo:hasGeometry ?AbercrombyGeo . ?AbercrombyGeo geo:asWKT ?AbercrombyWKT . filter( str(?l2)="Liverpool"). filter( str(?l)="Abercromby Square"). filter(geof:sfContains(?LiverpoolWKT, ?hospitalWKT)). filter (geof:distance(?hospitalWKT, ?AbercrombyWKT, uom:metre) < 1000). }

question: Which cafes in London are at most 3 km from St. Anthony the Great and St. John the Baptist church?
answer: Select distinct ?cafe WHERE { ?cafe a osm:Cafe ; geo:hasGeometry ?cafeGeo . ?cafeGeo geo:asWKT ?cafeWKT . ?London <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label>  ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LondonGeo . ?LondonGeo geo:asWKT ?LondonWKT . ?church osm:has_name ?l; geo:hasGeometry ?churchGeo . ?churchGeo geo:asWKT ?churchWKT . filter( str(?l2)="London"). filter( str(?l)="St. Anthony the Great & St. John the Baptist"). filter(geof:sfContains(?LondonWKT, ?cafeWKT)). filter (geof:distance(?cafeWKT, ?churchWKT, uom:metre) < 3000). }

question: Which department stores are at most 2km from Central Park hotel in London?
answer: SELECT distinct ?city WHERE{      ?city geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom;                   osm:has_name "London"^^xsd:string;                   rdf:type osm:City.     ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT.      ?poi geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom;                   osm:has_name "Central Park Hotel"^^xsd:string;                   a osm:Hotel.        ?poiGeom geo:asWKT        ?poiWKT.    ?dept a osm:Department_Store;           geo:hasGeometry ?dGeom.      ?dGeom geo:asWKT ?dWKT.    FILTER(geof:sfContains(?cWKT, ?poiWKT) && geof:distance(?dWKT,?cWKT,uom:metre) <= 2000 ) }

question: How many rivers cross England's cities?
answer: SELECT (COUNT(distinct ?x1) as ?num) WHERE {         ?x1 a osm:River.         ?x1 geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo.         ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT.         <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England> geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo.         ?x2Geo geo:asWKT.         ?x3 a osm:City.        ?x3 geo:hasGeometry ?x3Geo.        ?x3Geo geo:asWKT ?x3WKT.         FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?x3WKT, ?x2WKT)).         FILTER(geof:sfCrosses(?x1WKT, ?x3WKT)). }

question: Is the City of London north of the Thames river?
answer: ASK {     ?l owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/London>; geo:hasGeometry ?lGeom.          ?lGeom geo:asWKT ?lWKT.      ?river osm:has_name "River Thames"^^xsd:string; rdf:type osm:River; geo:hasGeometry ?iGeometry2.          ?iGeometry2 geo:asWKT ?iWKT2.        FILTER(strdf:above(?lWKT, ?iWKT2))  }

question: Is there a castle in London near Trafalgar Square?
answer: ASK {         ?x1 a osm:Castle.         ?x1 geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo.         ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT.         ?instance owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/London>; geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo.         ?x2Geo geo:asWKT.         ?x3 osm:has_name "Trafalgar Square"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string>.         ?x3 geo:hasGeometry ?x3Geo.         ?x3Geo geo:asWKT ?x3WKT.         FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT)).         FILTER(geof:distance(?x1WKT, ?x3WKT, uom:metre) <= 500)). }

question: Which counties of England border country Scotland?
answer: select ?county where {        ?county  rdf:type  <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OS_County>;       geo:hasGeometry ?geomC.   ?geomC geo:asWKT ?cWKT.       <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Scotland> geo:hasGeometry ?sGeom.      ?sGeom geo:asWKT ?sWKT.                  <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England> geo:hasGeometry ?eGeom.        ?sGeom geo:asWKT ?eWKT.        FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?sWKT, ?cWKT) && geof:sfWithin(?cWKT,?eWKT)) }

question: Is there any airfield in Wellesbourne village in England?
answer: select distinct ?airfield where {   ?airfield rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_airfield_102687992>.   ?airfield ?p <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Wellesbourne>.      <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Wellesbourne> rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_village_108672738>;                 <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn>+ ?o.       FILTER CONTAINS(str(?o),"England") }

question: Is there an aerodrome in Essex?

question: Is Somerset west of Westmorland?
answer: ASK { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Somerset> geo:hasGeometry ?iGeometry1. ?iGeometry1 geo:asWKT ?iWKT1. ?y owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Westmorland>; geo:hasGeometry ?iGeometry2. ?iGeometry2 geo:asWKT ?iWKT2. FILTER(strdf:left(?iWKT1, ?iWKT2)) }

question: How many cities does Merseyside have?

question: What historic buildings are in Buckinghamshire?

FILTER( geof:sfWithin(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT) ) }

question: Which restaurants are at most 500m from the University of Liverpool?

question: Which villages in Scotland have a population of less than 500 people?

question: Is there a forest in Lancashire north of Burnley?

question: Is there a county of England that borders the Isle of Wight?

question: Is there a church in the county of Greater Manchester dedicated to St. Patrick?

question: Is there a car park at most 1km from Waterloo Bridge?
answer: ASK WHERE {   ?entity osm:has_osm_id ?id;           osm:has_name "Waterloo Bridge"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string>;           geo:hasGeometry ?geomWaterloo.    ?geomWaterloo geo:asWKT ?waterloogeomWKT.    ?park rdf:type osm:Parking;           geo:hasGeometry ?parkGeom.    ?parkGeom geo:asWKT ?parkGeomWKT. question: Is there a park in Dublin near Grafton Street?
answer: ASK {         ?x1 a osm:Park.         ?x1 geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo.         ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT.         ?x2 osm:has_name "Grafton Street"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string>.         ?x2 geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo.         ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT.         <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Dublin> geo:hasGeometry ?x3Geo.         ?x3Geo geo:asWKT ?x3WKT.         FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?x1WKT, ?x3WKT)).         FILTER(geof:distance(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT, uom:metre) < 1000). }

question: Is Trafalgar square located in London?

question: How many parks are there in Northampton?

question: Which aerodrome is in Essex?

question: Is Edinburgh west of Glasgow?
answer: ASK { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Edinburgh> geo:hasGeometry ?iGeometry1. ?iGeometry1 geo:asWKT ?iWKT1. ?y owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Glasgow>; geo:hasGeometry ?iGeometry2. ?iGeometry2 geo:asWKT ?iWKT2. FILTER(strdf:left(?iWKT1, ?iWKT2)) }

question: Is there an airport in Dublin?

question: Which Greek restaurants in London are near Wembley stadium?
answer: SELECT  ?poi ?name WHERE {   ?poi rdf:type osm:Restaurant .   ?poi geo:hasGeometry  ?poiGeom .   ?poiGeom  geo:asWKT ?poiWKT .   ?poi osm:has_name ?name .   ?instance owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/London> .   ?instance geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom .   ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT .   FILTER( geof:sfWithin(?poiWKT, ?instanceWKT) )   FILTER( CONTAINS(LCASE(?name), "greek") ) }

question: Which counties of Ireland does River Shannon cross?
answer: select distinct ?county where {       ?x owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Ireland>; geo:hasGeometry ?geomLC.      ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?niWKT.    ?county  rdf:type  <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSI_County_Council>;            <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomC.        ?geomC geo:asWKT ?cWKT.        ?river  rdf:type  osm:River;                 osm:has_name "River Shannon"^^xsd:string;                        geo:hasGeometry ?geomR.        ?geomR geo:asWKT ?rWKT.        FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?cWKT, ?niWKT))        FILTER(geof:sfCrosses(?rWKT, ?cWKT)) }

question: Which restaurants are near Baker Street in London?
answer: SELECT  distinct ?p2 WHERE {          ?l owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/London>; geo:hasGeometry ?lGeom.         ?lGeom geo:asWKT ?lWKT.   ?p1 osm:has_name "Baker Street"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string> ;                   geo:hasGeometry  ?p1geo .         ?p1geo  geo:asWKT ?p1aswkt.          ?p2 rdf:type osm:Restaurant;                geo:hasGeometry ?p2geo .         ?p2geo geo:asWKT ?p2aswkt. FILTER (geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt,?lWKT) && geof:distance(?p1aswkt, ?p2aswkt, uom:metre) < 500) }

question: Which countries border Wales?

question: Is England part of the United Kingdom ?

question: How many county councils are there in Ireland?
Which restaurants are near Stonehenge?

question: What tourist attractions are there in Belfast, Northern Ireland?

question: Which rivers in Scotland have more than 100 km length?

question: Which counties border county Donegal to the south?

question: Is there a forest near Manchester?

question: Does Hammersmith Bridge connect Hammersmith with Barnes?

question: Which is the highest mountain in Ireland?

question: Where is the closest market to Elephant and Castle underground station?

question: What is the name of Britain's longest river?

question: Which cities in England have at least 2 castles?

question: Which is the biggest county council in the Republic of Ireland?

question: Which football stadium has the biggest capacity in Ireland?
Which site of Manchester is the most popular?

question: Where is the nearest gas station to St. Peter's Square in Manchester?

FILTER (geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt, ?p2aswkt)) . BIND(geof:distance(?p1aswkt, ?p3aswkt, uom:metre) as ?distance) } ORDER BY ?distance LIMIT 1

question: What is the most populated city in the United Kingdom except London?

question: Which city of England is nearest to London?
answer: SELECT ?city  (geof:distance(?LondonWKT, ?cityWKT, uom:metre) as ?distance)  WHERE {    ?city a osm:City ; geo:hasGeometry ?cityGeo . ?cityGeo geo:asWKT ?cityWKT .     ?London a osm:City ;     osm:has_name  ?l2 ; geo:hasGeometry ?LondonGeo . ?LondonGeo geo:asWKT ?LondonWKT . filter( str(?l2)="London"). filter(?city != ?London). } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

question: Is there a river in Ireland that crosses more than 3 cities?

FILTER(CONTAINS(?xname,"Glasgow") && !CONTAINS(?yname,"Glasgow"))                               }

question: Does England have more counties than Ireland?
answer: select (COUNT(DISTINCT ?x) > COUNT(DISTINCT ?y)) {                {   select ?x  {    ?x rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_county_108546183>.                                    ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England>.                                     }}                            {   select ?y  {    ?y rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_county_108546183>.           ?y <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Ireland>.                                     }}                            }

question: Which is the largest lake in England?

question: Are the cities that River Thames crosses more than 10?

question: Which county of England occupies the largest area?

question: What is the longest bridge in Scotland?

question: Which hospital is nearest to Calton Hill in Edinburgh?
answer: Select ?hospital (geof:distance(?hospitalWKT, ?CaltonWKT, uom:metre) as ?distance) WHERE { ?hospital a osm:Hospital ; geo:hasGeometry ?hospitalGeo . ?hospitalGeo geo:asWKT ?hospitalWKT . <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Edinburgh> geo:hasGeometry ?EdinburghGeo . ?EdinburghGeo geo:asWKT ?EdinburghWKT . ?Calton osm:has_name ?l; geo:hasGeometry ?CaltonGeo . ?CaltonGeo geo:asWKT ?CaltonWKT . filter( str(?l)="Calton Hill"). filter(geof:sfContains(?EdinburghWKT, ?hospitalWKT)). } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

question: Which is the closest airport to London?
answer: SELECT ?poi WHERE   { SERVICE <http://pyravlos1.di.uoa.gr:8080/geoqa/Query>       { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/London> geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom.                          ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT        ?instanceWKT.         ?poi rdf:type osm:Airport ;              geo:hasGeometry ?poiGeom .         ?poiGeom  geo:asWKT        ?poiWKT .            }       BIND(geof:distance(?instanceWKT, ?poiWKT, uom:metre) as ?res)   } ORDER BY ?res LIMIT 1

question: Which is the highest building in London?

question: Is the county of Antrim bigger than the county of Armagh?

question: Which is the smallest lake in Scotland?

question: Which hotel is the nearest to Old Trafford Stadium in Manchester?
answer: Select ?hotel (geof:distance(?hotelWKT, ?TraffordWKT, uom:metre) as ?distance) WHERE { ?hotel a osm:Hotel ; geo:hasGeometry ?hoteleo . ?hotelGeo geo:asWKT ?hotelWKT . <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Manchester> geo:hasGeometry ?ManchesterGeo . ?ManchesterGeo geo:asWKT ?ManchesterWKT . ?Trafford osm:has_name ?l; geo:hasGeometry ?TraffordGeo ; a osm:Stadium . ?TraffordGeo geo:asWKT ?TraffordWKT . filter( str(?l)="Old Trafford"). filter(geof:sfContains(?ManchesterWKT, ?hotelWKT)). } ORDER BY ASC(?distance) LIMIT 1

Which town has the biggest population in Scotland?

question: Which towns of England have at least two hospitals?

question: What London underground stations are closest to the British Museum?
answer: SELECT ?poi ?wkt WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Railway_Station. ?poi geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?instance rdf:type osm:Museum . ?instance osm:has_name "British Museum"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string> . ?instance geo:hasGeometry ?inGeom . ?inGeom geo:asWKT ?inWKT . FILTER (geof:distance(?wkt, ?inWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/OGC/1.0/metre>) < 500 ) . }

question: What is the distance between Liverpool and Glasgow?
